## d3 package

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [applyNominalAttrWithSignalState(selection, attr, getState, accessor, theme, size)](./d3.applynominalattrwithsignalstate.md) |  |
|  [attr(selection, attrs)](./d3.attr.md) | Applies a key/value map of attrs to a selection. Can be used with d3 selection.call to chain. https://github.com/d3/d3-selection\#selection\_attr |
|  [axis(group, theme, axisGenerator, options)](./d3.axis.md) | Applies axis properties to an axis group. Warning: this modifies the selection! This method updates the axis generator (see d3-axis) to ensure it has theme tick properties, Then applies formatting to the axis line, ticks, and labels according to the theme configuration. |
|  [chart(svg, theme, options)](./d3.chart.md) | Applies chart properties to a selection. This is intended to use with the d3 selection.call mechanism. Warning: this modifies the selection! |
|  [circle(selection, child)](./d3.circle.md) | Apply props for circle-based marks to a selection. |
|  [classed(selection, classes)](./d3.classed.md) | Applies a key/value map of classes to a selection. Use truthy to apply or falsey to remove Can be used with d3 selection.call to chain. https://github.com/d3/d3-selection\#selection\_classed |
|  [diverging(theme, domain, scaleType, quantiles)](./d3.diverging.md) | Creates a d3-compatible divering scale using the theme. Returns a function that takes a number and returns an appropriate color. |
|  [diverging2(theme, domain, scaleType, quantiles)](./d3.diverging2.md) | Creates a d3-compatible divering (variant 2) scale using the theme. Returns a function that takes a number and returns an appropriate color. |
|  [greys(theme, domain, scaleType, quantiles)](./d3.greys.md) | Creates a d3-compatible sequential (greys) scale using the theme. Returns a function that takes a number and returns an appropriate color. |
|  [line(selection, child)](./d3.line.md) | Apply props for line-based marks to a selection. |
|  [nominal(theme, size)](./d3.nominal.md) | Creates a d3-compatible nominal scale using the theme. Returns a function that takes a key and returns an appropriate color. |
|  [nominalBold(theme, size)](./d3.nominalbold.md) | Creates a d3-compatible nominal (bold) scale using the theme. Returns a function that takes a key and returns an appropriate color. |
|  [nominalMuted(theme, size)](./d3.nominalmuted.md) | Creates a d3-compatible nominal (muted) scale using the theme. Returns a function that takes a key and returns an appropriate color. |
|  [on(selection, ons)](./d3.on.md) | Applies a key/value map of event handlers to a selection. Can be used with d3 selection.call to chain. https://github.com/d3/d3-selection\#selection\_on |
|  [path(selection, child)](./d3.path.md) | Apply props for path-based marks to a selection. |
|  [plotArea(group, theme, options)](./d3.plotarea.md) | Applies plot area group properties to the chart. Warning: this modifies the selection! This method also creates a background rectangle to fill the plot area, so we can apply styling. See the options block for properties you can set on this rectangle. |
|  [rect(selection, child)](./d3.rect.md) | Apply props for rect-based marks to a selection. |
|  [sequential(theme, domain, scaleType, quantiles)](./d3.sequential.md) | Creates a d3-compatible sequential scale using the theme. Returns a function that takes a number and returns an appropriate color. |
|  [sequential2(theme, domain, scaleType, quantiles)](./d3.sequential2.md) | Creates a d3-compatible sequential (variant 2) scale using the theme. Returns a function that takes a number and returns an appropriate color. |
|  [style(selection, styles)](./d3.style.md) | Applies a key/value map of styles to a selection. Use truthy to apply or falsey to remove Can be used with d3 selection.call to chain. \* https://github.com/d3/d3-selection\#selection\_style |
|  [svg(selection, child)](./d3.svg.md) |  |
|  [text(selection, child)](./d3.text.md) | Applt props for text-based marks to a selection. |
